author: Juliegrace Brufke
title: McCaul says China must do more to control animal markets
description: Rep. Mike McCaul (R-Texas), the top Republican on the House Committee on Foreign Affairs, says China must do more with its markets to prevent the outbreak of diseases like the coronavirus.In a Monday letter to Tedr...
content:
Rep. Mike McCaul (R-Texas), the top Republican on the House Committee on Foreign Affairs, says China must do more with its markets to prevent the outbreak of diseases like the coronavirus. 
In a Monday letter to Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, head of the World … [+1716 chars]
